Class Player

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.entities.Entity
de.oth.blocklib.entities.Npc
de.oth.blocklib.entities.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attacker, Renderable, java.io.Serializable

extends Npc
implements Attacker
